description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"6v18n","text":"Features:
• For high quality DNA or RNA that is free of enzymatic inhibitors including polyphenolics, humic/fulvic acids, tannins, melanin, etc.
• Fast, one-step procedure for “cleaning” impure samples prior to PCR, sequencing, RT, etc.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mfbh","text":"
Description:
The OneStep‱ PCR Inhibitor Removal Kit contains all the components needed to efficiently remove contaminants from DNA/RNA preparations that can inhibit downstream enzymatic reactions such as PCR and RT. The column matrix has been specifically designed for efficient removal of polyphenolic compounds, humic/fulvic acids, tannins, melanin, etc. from most impure DNA and RNA preparations. Sample cleanup is as simple as: applying, spinning and recovering a sample from the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8vdr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aonk7","text":"The steps and abstract for this protocol consist entirely of the manufacturer's instructions with no deviations, as per https://files.zymoresearch.com/protocols/_d6030_onestep_pcr_inhibitor_removal_kit.pdf. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":120,"length":85}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"848B345C817111EFAC910A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"41D69E74817311EFAC910A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://files.zymoresearch.com/protocols/_d6030_onestep_pcr_inhibitor_removal_kit.pdf"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f4lt8","text":"Insert column into a Collection Tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77c4o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hejf","text":"*Please note that matrix in the column may appear dehydrated, or powdery. This is normal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":89}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"995t5","text":"Open the cap, add 600 µl of Prep-Solution and centrifuge at 8,000 x g for 3 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dmrk","text":"Inhibitor Removal:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blps2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7m422","text":"Transfer the prepared column to a clean 1.5 ml microcentrifuge tube. Add 50 - 200 µl DNA or RNA (in water, TE, or similar) to the Zymo-Spin‱ III-HRC Column and centrifuge at 16,000 x g for 3 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":139,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e5c8v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9ujm","text":"The filtered DNA (or RNA) is suitable for PCR, (RT), and other downstream applications.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"38EBC2A0817111EFAC910A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}
